name: Blockster
description:
Neighbour's grass is always greener! Reach your annoying neighbour's house while preventing it to do the same! Throw blocks and die a lot in a frenetic pvp duel!

Game is 1v1 in local coop. 2 joysticks are required.

Controls

-  (Square) / (X) -> grab block / throw block (tip: you can grab the block underneath you by holding your joystick Down while pressing. You can aim your throw with your left joystick)

- (Cross) / (A) -> jump

This game was made in 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2019: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/blockster

Team:

Giacomo Parolini - programming, design

Matteo Bianchi - programming

Tommaso Schettini - programming, design, art

Valentina Saran - art
